summary: Run-DMC was a super popular hip hop group from New York City in the 1980s. They were made up of Joseph Simmons, Darryl McDaniels, and Jason Mizell. This group was one of the first to make hip hop music really big. They had lots of hit songs, like "Walk This Way" with Aerosmith. Run-DMC was the first hip hop group to get many important awards and to appear on TV shows like MTV and American Bandstand. They are still considered one of the best hip hop groups ever.
title: Run-DMC
